last_episode_to_air.name: Ero Manga Mitai na Koi Shiyo
last_episode_to_air.overview: Another name, "Let's Fall in Love Ero-manga" (LFLEM) consists of four short ero-manga plots in a 2-part series on cute ecchi love. Funny, exotic, and sweet, LFLEM provides a huge dose of MOE for otaku around the world who are tempted and dissatisfied with ordinary anime.

name: Ero Manga Mitai na Koi Shiyo
original_name: Ero Manga Mitai na Koi Shiyo
overview: Another name, "Let's Fall in Love Ero-manga" (LFLEM) consists of four short ero-manga plots in a 2-part series on cute ecchi love. Funny, exotic, and sweet, LFLEM provides a huge dose of MOE for otaku around the world who are tempted and dissatisfied with ordinary anime.
